thread.section_title: eVitamins Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eVitamins | www.evitamins.com | 8 of 90
thread.title: Julie Pflepsen

author: Julie Pflepsen
title: Julie Pflepsen
text: Offers large selection with low and reasonable prices. Site gave real good details on all products ordered. With free shipping, my orders were shipped within 2-3 days after ordering. My only dislike is that eVitamins only offers free shipping on up to 5 pounds. I spent over $500 in vitamins which came to more than 5 lbs. That high amount should have given free shipping without the 5 lb limit.
